Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that BLM Fresno riots will begin at 4 p.m. in River Park on 06/02/20.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the provided post is accurate and represents the plans of the Black Lives Matter movement in Fresno, which has been contradicted by activists and officials.
Contradict fact: Activists and officials have denied any connection between the post and the Black Lives Matter movement, contradicting the claim.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the potential for riots by stating that they will begin at a specific time and location, without sufficient evidence to support this.
Understate: The claim may understate the efforts of activists and officials to maintain peace and discourage participation in riots, as highlighted by their denials and messages discouraging attendance.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the possibility that the post was made by individuals impersonating the Black Lives Matter movement, as suggested by activists and officials.
